Now \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w fat|strong="H1277"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w presented|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4503"\w* unto \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* followed \w his|strong="H5375"\w* companions \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w along|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w With|strong="H0935"\w* \w such|strong="H1571"\w* force \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* haft \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w blade|strong="H3851"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wound, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w was|strong="H1571"\w* \w closed|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*. \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w draw|strong="H8025"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dagger, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w body|strong="H0990"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* struck \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* forthwith \w by|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* secret \w parts|strong="H0990"\w* \w of|strong="H0935"\w* nature \w the|strong="H3588"\w* excrements \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.
But Aod carefully shutting \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \w of|strong="H1817"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* parlour \w and|strong="H3318"\w* locking \w them|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w waiting|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w time|strong="H5704"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w were|strong="H0369"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* seeing \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w key|strong="H4668"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w opening|strong="H4668"\w*, \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w found|strong="H0369"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w lying|strong="H5307"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.
